msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.title: Numbers 28
ab.l: And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying,

‘Command
the children of Israel and say to them,
“My offering, my bread with my offerings by fire, and
my aroma of acceptance: you shall watch out to bring |it| forward to me at its appointed time.”

And you shall say to them, “This is the offering by fire which you shall bring forward
to the Lord: two unblemished one-year-old lambs, per day,
a continual burnt offering.

You shall do one lamb
at dawn, and you shall do the second lamb
at twilight.

And a tenth
part of an ephah of fine flour for a grain offering, mixed
with the fourth part of a hin of beaten olive oil.

It is a continual burnt offering, which was done at Mount Sinai, an
aroma of acceptance, an offering by fire to the Lord.

And its drink offering
shall be the fourth part of a hin for one lamb; in the holy place, to
pour the drink offering of strong drink before the Lord.

And the second lamb you shall offer at twilight.
You shall do it like the grain offering of the dawn and like its drink offering:
An offering by fire, an aroma of acceptance to the Lord.

And on the Sabbath day: two unblemished one-year-old lambs,
and two-tenths of an ephah of fine flour, a grain offering,
mixed with oil, and its drink offering:

The burnt offering
of every Sabbath on its Sabbath, besides the continual burnt offering
and its drink offering.

And on your new moons
you shall bring forward a burnt offering to the Lord: two calves, the young of cattle,
and one ram, seven unblemished one-year-old lambs.

And three-tenths |of a measure| of fine flour, a grain offering,
mixed with oil, for one calf, and two-tenths |of a measure|
of fine flour, a grain offering, mixed with oil, for one ram.

And a tenth |of a measure| of fine flour mixed with oil, a grain offering,
for every lamb: a burnt offering, an aroma of acceptance, an offering by fire to the Lord.

And their drink offerings shall be half a hin
for one calf, and the third part of a hin for a ram, and a fourth
part of a hin for a lamb, of wine: this is the burnt offering
of every month in its month throughout the months of the year.

And one kid of the goats for a sin offering to the Lord
shall be done, besides the continual burnt offering, and its drink offering.

And in the first month on the fourteenth
day of the month is the Passover to the Lord.

And
on the fifteenth day of this month is a holiday: seven days
shall unleavened bread be eaten.

On the first day there is a holy
convocation: you shall not do any slave labour.

But you shall bring forward
an offering by fire, a burnt offering to the Lord: two calves, the young of cattle,
and one ram, and seven one-year-old lambs:
they shall be unblemished.

And their grain offerings:
fine flour mixed with oil: shall you do three-tenths |of a measure| for a calf and
two-tenths |of a measure| for a ram.

You shall do one
tenth |of a measure| for each lamb among the seven lambs.

And one goat of a sin offering to ask for atonement
for you.

You shall do these besides the burnt offering
at dawn that is for a continual burnt offering.

Like these shall you do, for every day,
for seven days, the bread of the offering by fire, an aroma of acceptance to the Lord.
It shall be offered besides the continual burnt offering and its drink offering.

And on the seventh day you shall have a holy convocation,
you shall do no slave labour.

And
on the day of the firstfruits, when you bring forward a new grain offering to the Lord,
after you have counted your seven weeks,
you shall have a holy convocation. You shall do no slave labour.

And you shall bring forward the burnt offering, an aroma of acceptance to the Lord:
two calves, the young of cattle, one ram, seven one-year-old lambs,

And their grain offerings of fine flour
mixed with oil, three-tenths |of a measure| for one calf, two-
-tenths |of a measure| for one ram,

One tenth
|of a measure| for each lamb among the seven lambs.
And one kid of the goats to ask for atonement for you.

You shall offer them besides the continual burnt offering
and its grain offering, you shall do these, they shall be unblemished to you, and their drink
offerings.
